CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 23, 1957, pg. 20, reads: "Golden Gloves Champs - Champions in three of the divisions display the fists that carried them to Golden Glove titles at the Pitt Field House Tuesday night. Left to right: Bill Bodish, 112-pound, senior novice; George Grisham, 147-pound, junior division; Don Young, 135-pound, senior open; Richie Johnson, 147-pound, senior novice; Cephus Huff, 175-pound, senior novice; Moses Scott, 160-pound, senior open; Connie Vaughn, 160-pound, junior division, and Joe Moye, 175-pound, junior division. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Golden Gloves boxers Bill Bodish, George Grisham, Don Young, Richie Johnson, Cephus Huff, Moses Scott, Connie Vaughn, and Joe Moye posed with fists raised and wearing satin robes, possibly in locker room at Pitt Field House
